# The `OutputSections` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class keeps contents and offsets to the debug sections. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class keeps contents and offsets to the debug sections.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> objects which is supposed to be emitted into the debug sections should use this class to track debug sections offsets and keep sections data.

Definition at line 303 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/outputsections-h">OutputSections.h</a>.
